# DocumentViewer

- **ControlName**: DocumentViewer
- **CodeFile**: System/Windows/Controls/DocumentViewer.cs
- **BaseClass**: DocumentViewerBase
- **ControlType**: Control
- **ContentProperty**: Document

## Template parts

| Part Name | Part Type | Description |
|-----------|-----------|-------------|
| PART_FindToolBarHost | ContentControl | The host container for the find toolbar. |
| PART_ContentHost | ScrollViewer | The host container for the document content. |

## Visual states

This control doesn't define any visual states.
